Title: Requires that nursing home patients who previously tested positive for COVID-19 shall produce a negative test result before he or she can be readmitted to such nursing home
Summary: Requires that nursing home patients who have previously tested positive for COVID-19 shall produce a negative test result before he or she can be readmitted to such nursing home
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring that nursing home patients who have previously tested positive for COVID-19 shall produce a negative test result before he or she can be readmitted to such nursing home
